title: MernPos
description: MernPos Is Point Of Sale WebApp,Is Used To Generate Bills For Products And Print Those Bills,Used Cloudinary Media Cdn Store Images Of Products And MongoDb For DataBase.

title: FoodMerlin
description: FoodMerlin Is A Mern Stack E-Commerce App People Can Register/SignIn And Add Products To Cart And Checkout Them And Can Pay Via Any Type Of Card,I Have Implemented Stripe For Payment

title: Emk
description: Emk Is Basically A Quiz App Inspired From Be A Millionaire,Using OpenTriviaDb Api To Get Questions,it Was Very First Project In ReactJs
